935340.name: Green Dragon/グリーンドラゴン
935340.description:
Fight against evil corporation in this Arcade Beat 'Em Up game, in the imaginary streets of Hong Kong, Helsinki and Tokyo...

Game is created by using special engine, which is specialized for Beat 'Em Up games. Special engine is created by the Beat 'Em Up pioneer Jason Orme, and we have heavily modified the engine to our purposes (possible bugs are our own creations :D).





Tougo is a distinguished martial artist recruited by a British intelligence agency takes part in a fierce fight against mysterious Cannabis drugs lord Taito, who is also responsible for Dee's fathers death. Together with agent "Alice" (Kiyori) they discover the drug lair situated at an urban city and try to defeat Taito's Gangs in a brutal battle.

Taito's Gang



Naturally Taito's Gangs try to defeat you to complete your mission. They defend their drug-territory strongly and do not give up easily. Taito's Gang is well organized and they have also bribed officials to their side. For you and agent Kiyori, it might be most safe to trust no-one...

Your mission

Before you can beat Taito and make this corner of earth more safer place, you need to kill numerous smaller bosses on each city (*13th of May version have 1 level).

Receive intelligence Data



*This feature has not yet been implemented to the Version 1.0:
During your missions, you will receive valuable intelligence reports from agency headquarter or local agents. You can make us of this data or dismiss it. Which path you choose depends of you. Intelligence reports will help you complete your missions more easily... but be sure that you don't be misled by Double agent(s). You might also receive some new weapons/vehicles from agency Research and Development division.

Go inside to premises while playing the level



*This feature has not yet been implemented to the Version 1.0:
You will be able to enter shops, restaurants and clubs while playing the main level. Pop inside the restaurant and rest for a moment while fighting!



With 1 level, this Early Access First Version offers taste of the future gameplay. And of course it also offers good entertainment!

Features on Version 1.0. (20 October):

  • 1 level, animated city
  • Attack enemy with a knife
  • Grab enemy
  • Grab Hit enemy
  • Pick and throw objects
  • Flying Kick attack
  • Attack against enemy with 3 different kind of hit styles
  • Throw Enemy
  • Down Attack



Planned features are: (Level 2 will be added to the game during the first week of launch period (7 days after release).

  • End Boss to level 1
  • Level 2 with an End Boss
  • Several different levels
  • At least 2 unique enemy
  • Several different end Bosses
  • Ability to drive a car
  • Ability to fly a helicopter

Controls:


Player 1 (Tougo)
Jump = Shift
Move = Arrow keys
Hit = Ctrl
Pick object = Ctrl

Multiplayer mode available. We will be update control-info here on 21 October.

Special thanks


Special thanks goes to Jason Orme, about his engineering work creating this amazing engine! We have heavily modified the engine to our purposes.

PC & MAC-versions available

Play on PC and Mac. Mac-version has released today 24 October.

*具有完全音频支持的语言
